docs.snippet: President-elect Donald Trump took aim at drugmakers on Wednesday  by promising in a magazine interview that "I'm going to bring down drug prices," sending shares of pharmaceutical and biotechnology companies lower....
docs.lead_paragraph: President-elect Donald Trump took aim at drugmakers on Wednesday  by promising in a magazine interview that "I'm going to bring down drug prices," sending shares of pharmaceutical and biotechnology companies lower.

headline.main: Trump Vows to Bring Down Drug Prices, Doesn't Say How
headline.print_headline: Trump Vows to Bring Down Drug Prices, Doesn't Say How

docs.snippet: A Michigan state appeals court on Tuesday ordered a halt to the recount of that state's presidential election vote sought by Green Party candidate Jill Stein, while a federal appeals court ordered the process to proceed....
docs.lead_paragraph: A Michigan state appeals court on Tuesday ordered a halt to the recount of that state's presidential election vote sought by Green Party candidate Jill Stein, while a federal appeals court ordered the process to proceed.

headline.main: U.S., State Courts Issue Conflicting Rulings on Michigan Vote Recount
headline.print_headline: U.S., State Courts Issue Conflicting Rulings on Michigan Vote Recount

docs.snippet: A Harvard University study released Wednesday concludes that media coverage of the 2016 presidential election was topped only by the 2000 Bush-Gore campaign for its overwhelming negativity....
docs.lead_paragraph: A Harvard University study released Wednesday concludes that media coverage of the 2016 presidential election was topped only by the 2000 Bush-Gore campaign for its overwhelming negativity.

headline.main: Study: 2016 Campaign Coverage Was Overwhelmingly Negative

docs.snippet: Michigan's presidential recount was halted Wednesday after three days, assuring Republican Donald Trump's victory in the state, when a federal judge said he'll abide by a court ruling that found the Green Party candidate Jill Stein couldn't seek a...
docs.lead_paragraph: Michigan's presidential recount was halted Wednesday after three days, assuring Republican Donald Trump's victory in the state, when a federal judge said he'll abide by a court ruling that found the Green Party candidate Jill Stein couldn't seek another look at the vote.

headline.main: Michigan Recount Over; Pennsylvania Sets Hearing
headline.print_headline: Michigan Recount Over; Pennsylvania Sets Hearing

docs.snippet: Republican Ohio Treasurer Josh Mandel will again challenge Democratic U.S. Sen. Sherrod Brown in 2018, setting up what could be a rematch of what was one of the country's most bitter, expensive and closely watched Senate races four years ago....
